description: Presets that harden security for shared GitHub Action Workflows

packageRules.description: Pin `github-action` digests. As per GitHubs [security best practice](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/security-guides/security-hardening-for-github-actions#using-third-party-actions).

GitHub has forked the tibdex/github-app-token workflow and have vowed to maintain it and uphold strict security best practices: https://github.com/tibdex/github-app-token/issues/99#issuecomment-1787602874
